settings.code:
<style>
h1,
h2,
h3,
h4,
h5,
h6,
p,
a,
span {
    font-family: 'Poppins';
    margin: 0;
}

.content {
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 66.667vw;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
.content_860{
    width: 100%;
    max-width: 44.792vw;
    margin: 0 auto;
}
/*Page banner style*/
.page_banner {
    position: relative;
}

.page_banner img {
    width: 100%;
}

.page_banner .banner_box {
    position: absolute;
    left: 20%;
    top: 9.896vw;
    max-width: 44.271vw;
    text-align: center;
}

.page_banner .banner_box h1 {
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 1.875vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
}

.page_banner .banner_box p {
    font-size: 1.042vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    opacity: 0.8;
    margin: 0.521vw 0 0 0;
}
.banner_bottom {
    background: #000000;
    width: 100%;
    padding: 1.042vw 0;
}

.banner_bottom ul {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
}

.banner_bottom ul li {
    font-size: 0.729vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    text-align: center;
    max-width: 33.333%;
}
/* section 1*/
.section_1{
    margin: 6.25vw 0;
}
.section_1 h2{
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 1.875vw;
    text-align: center;
    color: #000000;
}
.section_1 .work_box{
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    margin: 2.083vw 0 1.823vw 0;
}
.section_1 .work_box .item{
    max-width: 10.417vw;
    text-align: center;
}
.section_1 .work_box .item .icon{
    display: inline-block;
    width: 6.25vw;
    height: 6.25vw;
}
.section_1 .work_box .item p{
    font-size: 0.833vw;
    line-height: 1.25vw;
    color: #727273;
    margin-top: 1.042vw;
}
.section_1 .work_box > .icon{
    display: inline-block;
    width: 1.5625vw;
    height: 1.146vw;
    margin-top: 2.5vw;
}
.section_1 .join_box{
    padding: 4.167vw 0;
    background: #F8F8F9;
}
.section_1 .join_box h3{
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 1.25vw;
    color: #000000;
    margin-bottom: 1.5625vw;
}
.section_1 .join_box p{
    font-size: 1.042vw;
    line-height: 1.5625vw;
    color: #727273;
}
.section_1 .join_box a{
    display: inline-block;
    margin-top: 1.5625vw;
    font-size: 0.833vw;
    color: #3F87FF;
}
/* section 2 */
.section_2 h2{
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 1.875vw;
    line-height: 2.8125vw;
    text-align: center;
    color: #000000;
}
.section_2 .discount_box{
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    margin: 2.083vw 0;
}
.section_2 .discount_box .item{
    text-align: center;
}
.section_2 .discount_box .item .icon{
    display: inline-block;
    width: 7.292vw;
    height: 7.292vw;
}
.section_2 .discount_box .item a{
    display: inline-block;
    width: 9.375vw;
    height: 1.875vw;
    text-align: center;
    line-height: 1.875vw;
    background: #000000;
    border-radius: 0.208vw;
    font-weight: 600;
    font-size: 1.042vw;
    color: #FFFFFF;
    margin: 1.042vw 0 0.78125vw 0;
}
.section_2 .discount_box .item p{
    font-size: 0.833vw;
    color: #727273;
}
.section_2 .discount_box .item p span{
    font-weight: 600;
}
.section_2 .content_860 > p{
    font-size: 0.833vw;
    color: #BEBEBF;
    margin-bottom: 1.302vw;
}
.section_2 .content_860 > p span{
    font-weight: 600;
    text-decoration-line: underline;
    color: #3F87FF;
}
.section_2 .content_860 > p span:hover{
    cursor: pointer;
}
.section_2 .content_860 > p span .icon{
    max-width: 0.921vw;
    max-height: 0.921vw;
    transform: rotate(90deg);
}
.section_2 .content_860 > p span .icon_270{
    transform: rotate(270deg);
}
.section_2 .learm_more{
    text-align: center;
}
.section_2 .learm_more p{
    font-size: 0.833vw;
    line-height: 1.25vw;
    color: #BEBEBF;
   
}
.section_2 .learm_more p:nth-child(2),.section_2 .learm_more p:nth-child(3){
    margin-bottom: 1.5625vw;
}
/* section 3 */
.section_3{
    margin: 6.25vw 0;
}
.section_3 .section_box{
    background: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/Paper_pc.png?v=1681121418') center center/100% 100% no-repeat;
    padding: 6.25vw 10.417vw;
    text-align: center;
}
.section_3 .section_box h2{
    font-weight: 700;
    font-size: 1.875vw;
    color: #000000;
    margin-bottom: 1.5625vw;
}
.section_3 .section_box p{
    font-size: 0.833vw;
    line-height: 1.354vw;
    color: #000000;
    opacity: 0.8;
}
/* section 4 */
.section_4{
    padding: 2.083vw 0;
    text-align: center;
    background: #F8F8F9;
}
.section_4 p{
    font-size: 0.833vw;
    line-height: 1.354vw;
    color: #B9B9B9;
}
@media (max-width:768px) {
    .content_860,.content{
        max-width: 100%;
    }
    .page_banner .banner_box{
      max-width: 72vw; 
      left: 50%;
      transform: translateX(-50%);
      top: 21.333vw;
    }
    .page_banner .banner_box h1{
        font-size: 7.467vw;
        line-height: 10.133vw;
    }
    .page_banner .banner_box p{
        font-size: 4.267vw;
        margin-top: 2.667vw;
        opacity: 1;
    }
    .banner_bottom{
        padding: 6.667vw 0;
    }
    .banner_bottom ul li{
        max-width: 100%;
        font-size: 3.733vw;
    }
    .section_1{
        margin: 21.333vw 0;
    }
    .section_1 h2{
        font-size: 6.4vw;
    }
    .section_1 .work_box{
        margin: 10.667vw 0;
        justify-content: center;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
    }
    .section_1 .work_box .item{
        max-width: 100%;
        width: 100%;
    }
    .section_1 .work_box .item .icon{
        width: 32vw;
        height: 32vw;
    }
    .section_1 .work_box .item p{
        font-size: 3.733vw;
        line-height: 5.600vw;
        margin: 2.667vw auto 0 auto;
        max-width: 58.667vw;
    }
    .section_1 .work_box > .icon{
        transform: rotate(90deg);
        margin: 8vw 0;
        width: 4.267vw;
        height: 5.867vw;
    }
    .section_1 .join_box{
        padding: 10.667vw 5.333vw;
    }
    .section_1 .join_box h3{
        text-align: center;
        font-size: 5.333vw;
        margin-bottom: 8vw;
    }
    .section_1 .join_box p{
        font-size: 4.267vw;
        line-height: 6.4vw;
        margin-bottom: 5.333vw;
    }
    .section_1 .join_box a{
        font-size: 3.733vw;
        line-height: 5.867vw;
        margin-top: 5.333vw;
    }
    .section_2 h2{
        font-size: 6.4vw;
        line-height: 9.067vw;
        padding: 0 4vw;
    }
    .section_2 .discount_box{
        margin: 10.667vw 0 10.667vw 10.667vw;
        overflow-y: auto;
    }
    .section_2 .discount_box .item{
        flex-shrink: 0;
        max-width: 53.333vw;
        margin-right: 5.333vw;
    }
    .section_2 .discount_box .item .icon{
        width: 42.667vw;
        height: 42.667vw;
    }
    .section_2 .discount_box .item a{
        width: 39.467vw;
        height: 8.533vw;
        border-radius: 1.067vw;
        line-height: 8.533vw;
        font-size: 4.267vw;
        margin: 5.333vw 0 2.667vw 0;
    }
    .section_2 .discount_box .item p{
        font-size: 3.733vw;
    }
    .section_2 .discount_box .item p span{
        display: none;
    }
    .section_2 .content_860 > p{
        font-size: 3.733vw;
        line-height: 5.600vw;
        padding: 0 4vw;
    }
    .section_2 .learm_more{
        padding: 2vw 5vw;
    }
    .section_2 .learm_more p{
        font-size: 3.733vw;
        line-height: 5.600vw;
    }
    .section_3{
        margin: 21.333vw 0;
    }
    .section_3 .section_box{
        background: url('https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/lQLPJwuZWRBBUmrNA3jNAu6w1KOLQefeFf8ELnkQJUAEAA_750_888.png?v=1681292368') center center/100% 100% no-repeat;
        padding: 21.333vw 10.667vw;
    }
    .section_3 .section_box h2{
        font-size: 6.4vw;
        line-height: 9.067vw;
        margin-bottom: 8vw;
    }
    .section_3 .section_box p{
        font-size: 3.733vw;
        line-height: 5.867vw;
    }
    .section_4{
        padding: 6.667vw 5.333vw;
    }
    .section_4 p{
        font-size: 3.2vw;
        line-height: 5.333vw;
    }
}
</style>

Dropshipping Program

Be Our Partner Now

  • High Profits For Dropshipping Co-partners
  • Detailed Instructions And Free Training
  • Dedicated Service Representative Supports

How Does it Work

Customer place the order

Pass the order to your supplier

Supplier ships products to customer directly

Why Join In?

1. This allows you to sell a broad range of products without investment.

2. There is no expensive inventory or warehouse to maintain.

3. You do not have to spend time on packaging or mailing the merchandise.

4. You can use our pictures and descriptions to help you in your sales.

5. There is no minimum order. Buy as little or as much as you like.

Ugreen.com will ship your order with our local Warehouse in 5-7 days.

Different Levels of Dropshipping Co-partners and Discount Rates

Pre-VIP

DAA: 0-1,000 USD or 30 orders

VIP Preliminary

1,001-5000 USD or 100 orders

VIP Medium

5000-10,000 USD or 300 orders

* ID levels will be clarified by the Drop-shipping Account Amount (DAA) in a month. Learn More

ID levels will be clarified by the Drop-shipping Account Amount(DAA) in a month.For example:

Your initial ID level begins at Pre-VIP, after the total order amounts exceeds 1000 USD or 30 orders for the month. At that point, please contact us and we will upgrade your ID level (According to your last month's order amounts), and you will enjoy the latest discount associated with your ID level for the new month.

If the order amountor Orders monthly does not meet the required amount for the corresponding account ID level, your account ID level will decreased to the previous level.

Please note if you don‘t have any orders in 3 months, your dropping account will be cancelled.

How to Join Ugreen Dropshipping

In order to join the Ugreen Dropshipping Program, you must first create an account at Ugreen.com.

Send a message to dropshipping@ugreen.com Please include ”Dropshipping” in the subject line.

An ID level will be assigned after you’ve created an account and sent an email showing you’ve created an account.

We Guarantee None of The Followings Will Happen When We Dropshipto Your Clients.

1) We will NOT include the prices paid for the merchandise.

2) We will NOT contact with your customers in any way.
